A true classic.

Update 10/2019.

Valve should take their fanbase more seriously, stop working only for maximum profit (steam sales) and release HL2-part3 and Half-Life 3 once and for all.

Beloved Valve, keep in mind that if steam is what it is nowadays (and Valve itself), it is thanks for HL series success and the gamers who believed in the project.

Many of those gamers are not even among us anymore, given 15 years have passed. I am starting to think neither do I will live to see HL3. 20 years annyversary and still, we've heard nothing about it. Shame.

Is that all about money?

Well, looks like Valve is turning itself in just one more big tech and losing its essence as time passess by.

HL2 is amazing though. You, millenial reader, do yourself a favor and play this old school.

Classic game that if you enjoy singleplayer fps's it is a must play. The most important gameplay tip is DON'T rush through all the puzzles. Just calm down and you will enjoy the game much more. The combat was fun and as long as you took advantage of the physics it wasn't repetitive. The game also has this feel to it that non valve titles don't have, with the music being a perfect fit for the mood (which in my opinion is the most moody game i've played), and the sense of despair you get from the distopian nature accompanied by a glimmer of hope that isn't captured well in other games. There is also a sense that this COULD happen, something you don't get from other games. 

TLDR: Classic, stronk feels, and gewd gameplay
you can mod in yer favorite animay so that it can finally be real and yur dad respects you finally lol buy it.

I actually love this game. It is old, it has bad graphics and the physics are crap; but it is still an awesome FPS game with a cool story.
I enjoyed playing it and do recommend it (if it is on sale). It is cheap but I don't think we can compare the game quality with the actual game. I got from the VALVE complete pack on sale and it was fine...
Still one of the greatest games of all time. Stands up to the test of time.

„Der rechte Mann am falschen Ort, kann in dieser Welt viel bewegen.“    Half-Life 2 und ich das war die Liebe auf den ersten Blick . Es ist das beste Single-Player-Shooter-Erlebnis, das mir uneingeschränkt Spaß machte. Eine Abwechslungsreiche und dazu die ungewöhnliche Atmosphäre ,es war einfach der Hammer  . Und ich werde Half-Life 2 immer als jenes Spiel in Erinnerung behalten, das mich zu Steam brachte.

Great game, best one (nostalgia wise) I ever played. 
Only problem is that I have a feeling there will never be HL3 or EP3 looking at the current hl2 scheme..... 

Half life 2, Half life 2 EP1(2.1), half life 2 EP2(2.2) 

so I guess if there will ever be next Half Life game it will probably be Half Life 2 episode 2 chapter?/scene? 1 (2.2.1) and the next one will be EP2C/S2 (2.2.2). But wait 2+2+2 =6/2 = 3.....nope I give up.

leg·end·ar·y
/ˈlejənˌderē/Submit
adjective
adjective: legendary
1.
of, described in, or based on legends.
"a legendary British king of the 4th century"
synonyms:	fabled, storied, heroic, traditional, fairy-tale, storybook, mythical, mythological
"legendary knights"
antonyms:	factual, historical
2.
remarkable enough to be famous; very well known.
"her wisdom in matters of childbirth was legendary"
synonyms:	famous, celebrated, famed, renowned, acclaimed, illustrious, esteemed, honored, exalted, venerable, well known, storied, popular, prominent, distinguished, great, eminent, preeminent, high-profile; formallauded
"a legendary figure in sports"

Несмотря на "преклонный возраст" игра всё ещё хороша, больше всего в ней мне нравится главный герой. Этого персонажа не один я считаю странным. Редко в шутерах дают играть за учёного, который (под нашим чутким управлением) легко выкашивает и пришельцев и военных (первая часть игры) и элитных пришельцев и кого угодно. Спасает мир и не говорит ни слова (предполагается для того, чтобы мы вжились в роль этого учёного, но мне это всегда казалось проявление крутизны Фримэна). Жду: хоть третий эпизод, хоть третью часть, хочется узнать, что же будет дальше.

En universo de Half Life merece jugarse en su totalidad. La sensación de disparo que ofrece Half Life 2 es muy buena y placentera, los entornos increibles y la historia alucinante. Si quieren jugar un juego en primera persona shooter con una historia entretenida no hay como Half Life 2. Una reliquia entre los juegos de pc.
